normalized: several hours later.
worn-out, asuka had returned to the dso japan branch.

name: asuka
normalized: kotanicchi?!
everyone…?!
asuka's face was grim.

as proof, the figures of kotani and the staff, who would normally greet asuka, were nowhere.
the base had suddenly become uninhabited.

name: asuka
normalized: everyone?

where?!

scaary～～♪

normalized: kotanicchi?!

normalized: （i'll kill him!

if there weren't any damage to her android arms ＆ legs.
